scripts.pre-compile-all: rm -rf ./src/lib/contracts/compiled && ts-node src/lib/scripts/cli.ts compile -p src/lib/contracts/main -o src/lib/contracts/compiled
scripts.pre-compile-all-m1: rm -rf ./src/lib/contracts/compiled && ts-node src/lib/scripts/cli.ts compile -p src/lib/contracts/main -o src/lib/contracts/compiled -m true
scripts.compile: yarn pre-compile-all && rm -rf ./build && ts-node src/lib/scripts/cli.ts compile -f json -o src/lib/contracts/json
scripts.compile-m1: yarn pre-compile-all-m1 && rm -rf ./build && ts-node src/lib/scripts/cli.ts compile -f json -o src/lib/contracts/json -m true
scripts.migrate-testnet: yarn compile && ts-node src/lib/scripts/cli.ts migrate ithacanet
scripts.migrate-testnet-kms: yarn compile && ts-node src/lib/scripts/cli.ts migrate ithacanet-kms
scripts.test-full: yarn compile && yarn migrate && ts-mocha --paths test/*.spec.ts --bail --timeout 500000
scripts.test-full-m1: yarn compile-m1 && yarn migrate && ts-mocha --paths test/*.spec.ts --bail --timeout 500000
